changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE ruleform.resource_attribute ( id bigserial NOT NULL, resource bigint NOT NULL, attribute bigint NOT NULL, numeric_value numeric, integer_value integer, boolean_value boolean, text_value character varying, timestamp_value timestamp, -- If the Attribute has a timestamp value, it is stored in this column binary_value bytea, -- If the Attribute has a binary value, it is stored in this column unit bigint, sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, notes character varying, research bigint, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone,
CONSTRAINT resource_attribute_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT resource_attribute_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT resource_attribute_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT resource_attribute_resource_fkey FOREIGN KEY (resource) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT resource_attribute_unit_fkey FOREIGN KEY (unit) REFERENCES ruleform.unit (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT resource_attribute_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT resource_attribute_resource_key UNIQUE (resource , attribute ), CONSTRAINT resource_attribute_sequence_number_check CHECK (sequence_number > 0), CONSTRAINT resource_attribute_valid_value CHECK ((ruleform.null_zero(numeric_value) + ruleform.null_zero(integer_value) + ruleform.null_zero(boolean_value) + ruleform.null_zero(text_value) + ruleform.null_zero(timestamp_value) + ruleform.null_zero(binary_value)) = 1) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
